summary.span: 表示內含任何類型之單一內容的控制項。

span.span: Represents a control with a single piece of content of any type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以包含任何類型的 common language runtime 物件 (例如字串或物件) 或物件 (例如或)。The can contain any type of common language runtime object (such as a string or a object) or a object (such as a or a ). 這可讓您將豐富的內容加入至控制項這類和。This enables you to add rich content to controls such as and . 下圖顯示四個按鈕的屬性設定為下列其中之一：The following illustration shows four buttons whose property is set to one of the following: - 字串。A string. - 物件。A object. - 物件。A object. - A控制項，其中包含其他物件。A control that contains other objects. ![四個按鈕](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "四個按鈕")![Four buttons](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "Four buttons") 四個按鈕與不同類型的內容Four buttons with different types of content A有限制的預設樣式。A has a limited default style. 如果您想要加強控制項的外觀，您可以建立新。If you want to enhance the appearance of the control, you can create a new . 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 另一個典型的案例是使用來顯示有關選取之項目的詳細資訊控制項。Another typical scenario is to use the to show more information about an item selected in an control. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[＜How to：繫結至集合並根據選取項目顯示資訊](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md)。For more information, see [How to: Bind to a Collection and Display Information Based on Selection](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/how-to-bind-to-a-collection-and-display-information-based-on-selection.md). 此控制項的相依性屬性可能會設定控制項的預設樣式。Dependency properties for this control might be set by the control's default style. 如果屬性設定為預設樣式，屬性可能會變更其預設值，當控制項出現在應用程式。If a property is set by a default style, the property might change from its default value when the control appears in the application. 預設樣式會決定由哪一個桌面佈景主題時，會使用應用程式正在執行。The default style is determined by which desktop theme is used when the application is running. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 預設 WPF 佈景主題](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252)。For more information, see [Default WPF Themes](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=158252). ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立四個按鈕的 < 備註 > 一節所示。The following example demonstrates how to create the four buttons shown in the Remarks section. > [!NOTE] > 雖然[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]版的範例可以使用``標記每個按鈕的內容，不需要。Although the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] version of the example could use the `` tags around the content of each button, it is not necessary. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XAML 概觀 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md). [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)] 下列範例示範如何讓樣式使控制項具有增強的視覺外觀。The following example shows how to make a style for a so that the control has an enhanced visual appearance. remarks.format: ## Remarks 因為屬性的類型是，沒有任何限制，在您可以放入。Because the property is of type , there are no restrictions on what you can put in a . 會顯示，這是在的。The is displayed by a , which is in the of the . 每隔中輸入[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)]已在其預設。Every type in [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_winclient](~/includes/tla2sharptla-winclient-md.md)] has a in its default . 如需有關如何會顯示，請參閱。For more information about how the displays , see . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 屬性項目用法XAML Property Element Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values `Content` 文字或單一物件。Text or a single object. ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立四個控制項設為下列其中一項：The following example demonstrates how to create four controls with set to one of the following: - 字串。A string. - 物件。A object. - 物件。A object. - A控制項，其中包含其他物件。A control that contains other objects. > [!NOTE] > 雖然[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)]版的範例可以使用``標記每個按鈕的內容，不需要。Although the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xaml](~/includes/tlasharptla-xaml-md.md)] version of the example could use the `` tags around the content of each button, it is not necessary. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [XAML 概觀 (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md)。For more information, see [XAML Overview (WPF)](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-overview-wpf.md). [!code-xaml[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ControlContentOverviewSnippets#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ControlContentOverviewSnippets/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)] 下圖顯示先前範例中所建立的四個按鈕。The following illustration shows the four buttons created in the previous example. ![四個按鈕](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "四個按鈕")![Four buttons](~/add/media/controlcontentmodelbuttons.PNG "Four buttons")

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以是預先定義、 複合或自訂的字串格式。 can be a predefined, composite, or custom string format. 如需有關字串格式的詳細資訊，請參閱[格式化型別](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md)。For more information about string formats, see [Formatting Types](~/docs/standard/base-types/formatting-types.md). 如果您設定或是屬性，則屬性會被忽略。If you set the or property of a , the property is ignored. ## Examples 下列範例會指定的格式藉由設定物件中的屬性並套用兩個物件，繼承自。The following example specifies the format of objects by setting the property in a and applying the to two objects, which inherit from . summary.span: 取得或設定用來顯示 內容的資料範本。

span.span: Gets or sets the data template used to display the content of the .
A data template.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 將此屬性設定為指定的外觀。Set this property to a to specify the appearance of the . 如需有關資料範本的詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information on data templates, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *resourceExtension**resourceExtension* 識別如何將參考的範本資源，可能是標記延伸`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`。A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *styleResourceKey**styleResourceKey* 識別要求的範本選取器的索引鍵。The key that identifies the requested template selector. 索引鍵參考中的現有資源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . > [!NOTE] > 屬性元素語法是技術上可行，但不是建議使用。Property element syntax is technically possible, but not recommended. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 < [ 內嵌樣式和範本](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md)。For more information, see [Inline Styles and Templates](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/inline-styles-and-templates.md). ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例示範如何建立內容的範本，並將範本套用至內容控制項。The following examples show how to create a content template and apply the template to a content control. [!code-xaml[ContentControl#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#2)] [!code-xaml[ContentControl#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControl/CSharp/Page1.xaml#3)]

summary.span: 取得或設定一個樣板選取器，讓應用程式撰寫者可以提供自訂的樣板選取邏輯。

span.span: Gets or sets a template selector that enables an application writer to provide custom template-selection logic.
A data template selector.
The default value is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一般而言，您會建立有一個以上相同類型的物件，而且您想要提供您自己的邏輯，來選擇將根據每個資料物件的屬性。Typically, you create a when you have more than one for the same type of objects and you want to supply your own logic to choose a to apply based on the properties of each data object. 請注意，如果您有不同的物件型別可以設定屬性上的。Note that if you have objects of different types you can set the property on the . 如果這麼做，則不需要建立。If you do that, then there is no need to create a . 此外，如果您有物件型別相同，但有不同的屬性，您也可以考慮使用或資料轉換子。Furthermore, if you have objects of the same type but with different properties, you can also consider using a or a data converter. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱 [資料範本化概觀](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md)。For more information, see [Data Templating Overview](~/docs/framework/wpf/data/data-templating-overview.md). 若要建立的範本選取器，請建立繼承自類別，並覆寫方法。To create a template selector, create a class that inherits from and override the method. 您的類別定義之後，您可以指派給項目的範本選取器屬性的類別的執行個體。After your class is defined, you can assign an instance of the class to the template selector property of your element. 如果兩個而設定的屬性，則會忽略這個屬性。If both the and the properties are set, then this property is ignored. ## XAML Attribute UsageXAML Attribute Usage ``` ``` ## XAML 值XAML Values *ResourceExtension**ResourceExtension* 識別如何將參考的範本資源，可能是標記延伸`StaticResource`或`DynamicResource`。A markup extension that identifies how to reference the template resource, either `StaticResource` or `DynamicResource`. 請參閱[XAML 資源](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md)。See [XAML Resources](~/docs/framework/wpf/advanced/xaml-resources.md). *TemplateSelectorKey**TemplateSelectorKey* 識別要求的範本選取器的索引鍵。The key that identifies the requested template selector. 索引鍵參考中的現有資源。The key refers to an existing resource in a . ## 相依性屬性資訊Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |識別項欄位Identifier field|| |若要設定的中繼資料屬性 `true`Metadata properties set to `true`|無None| ## Examples 下列範例將示範如何使用 屬性。The following example shows how to use the property. 此範例會繫結中的選取項目要屬性，該項則繼承自。This example binds the selected item in a to the property of a , which inherits from . 當使用者選取低於 5 的值時，選取項目的值會出現在中黑色方塊。When the user selects a value below 5, the value of the selected item appears in a black square in the . 當使用者選取的值是 5 或以上的值會顯示綠色的橢圓形。When the user selects a value that is 5 or above, the value appears in a green ellipse. 範例達成方式是建立兩個物件和，這設定為屬性，並選擇適當根據選取的項目值。The example accomplishes this by creating two objects and a , which is set to the property and chooses the appropriate based on the value of the selected item. [!code-xaml[ContentControlTemplateSelector#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControlTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml#1)] [!code-csharp[ContentControlTemplateSelector#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControlTemplateSelector/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[ContentControlTemplateSelector#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/ContentControlTemplateSelector/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這`ShouldSerialize`提供方法，因為屬性並沒有簡單的預設值。This `ShouldSerialize` method is provided because the property does not have a simple default value. 這個方法會指出屬性是否已變更其預設值。This method indicates whether the property has changed from its default value. 您通常叫用這個方法如果您正在開發的設計工具或是開發您自己的控制項併入。You typically invoke this method if you are either developing a designer for the or developing your own control incorporating the .
